Question
========
What is true of ordinal level data?

Answerlist
----------
* The appropriate descriptive statistics are frequency and percent.
* These can be graphed using bar charts or pie charts.
* The distance between rankings is unknown.
* All nominal level tests can be performed.
* The median and the mode are meaningful measures of central tendency.
* The appropriate descriptive statistics are mean and standard deviation.
* Usually psychometric measurements.
* Usually physical measurements.
* Multiplication and division may be performed.

* True.
* True.

* True.
* False.
